body:
Comment 19 by **simonedichiara@maior.biz**: 
For linux:

	var goroot = runtime.GOROOT()
	var gobin = ""
	if runtime.GOOS == "windows" {
		gobin = goroot + "bin\\go"
	} else {
		gobin = goroot + "/bin/go"
	}

As before, I know this maybe not right, but it's just a suggestion.
I hope this will help. :)
